MESSAGE: Careful! You know not what lurks in that vile hut.

NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: Hey Ma Ling, could you help an old man?

NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: Sure, what kind of help do you need?

NAME: WU_HAI_1
MESSAGE: My hoe broke but I need to plow this field to grow rice and sell the harvest to the market.

MESSAGE: Sorry to hear that.

NAME: AH_YU_1
MESSAGE: Ah Yu whats wrong? Why are you crying?

NAME: AH_YU_1
MESSAGE: I accidentally ripped my favourite dress when I was trying to buy some apples.

NAME: AH_YU_1
MESSAGE: You poor girl!
